column2:
# Unifying ATC columns so to have them as vectors also.
Drugbank_DDI$ATC_vector <- paste(apply(Drugbank_DDI[,c("drug","codrug")],
                                       1,
                                       min),
                                 apply(Drugbank_DDI[,c("drug","codrug")],
                                       1,
                                       max),
                                 sep = "_")
